dc_title_s: Sketch showing the triangulation to establish the riparian line from Fort Lee to Pleasant Valley, Bergen Co.
dc_description_s: Map of an engineering survey drawing showing the triangulation lines to create the riparian line from Fort Lee to Pleasant Valley, Bergen County, New Jersey.|Source map supplied by New Jersey Department of Environmental Protection|Original location of monument fixed by measurements from old pier as per Annett Map and agreed upon as the correct location by J.S. Payne, Sect'y of the Riparian Commission Bearing as per survey of J.S. Payne 1891|Surveyed by Watson G. Clark, C.E.
